data.name: NFT Document Inspector

data.name: NagaBelajar
data.description: Platform to learn basic programing like an python,javascript and SQL . the feature provide an sandbox code editor with realtime terminal, it works with using child process from node then stream it to client side with socket.io then for the UI using the xterm js.
